description: Large, robust bolete with brown to reddish-brown cap, white to cream colored pores, and thick bulbous stem with fine white reticulation

cap_characteristics.color: Brown to reddish-brown, sometimes with lighter edges
cap_characteristics.surface: Smooth to slightly sticky when wet
cap_characteristics.shape: Convex when young, flattening with age

microscopic_features: Spores fusiform, 14-18 × 5-6 µm, smooth, olive-brown in mass
chemical_tests: No color change with KOH or FeSO4, flesh white throughout
